batchHops.userNotes: Home grown by The Thirsty Otter
batchHops.notes: Distinctive strong spicy/blackcurrant flavour and good aplha characteristics. A hop of considerable character. It has a strong spicy / blackcurrant flavour and good alpha characteristics. Bramling Cross has now made something of a comeback in traditional cask conditioned beers because of its very distinctive characteristics and has done very well in all styles of beer
batchHops.name: Bramling Cross

recipe.notes: Target: ABV = 4.2 %, IBU = 28, EBC = 7, OG = 1.036, FG = 1.004.

mashFermentables.notes: Used in lager and ale at a rate of up to 40%.

mashFermentables.usedIn: Wheat beers and adjunct for ales up to 40%of grist.
